original_title: All In: The Story of Auburn's Undefeated 2010 Season
overview: It was evident early in the season that something was special about this 2010 Auburn team.  There was a unique poise, confidence and a belief in one another as this Tiger team simply did whatever it took to win games. Dramatic come-from-behind victories, including overcoming a 24-0 deficit to defeat Alabama in Tuscaloosa in the final regular-season game, punctuated this teamâ€™s special character.  The Auburn Sports Network presents the story of the undefeated 2010 Auburn Tigers on DVD, including exclusive interviews, behind-the-scenes footage, play-by-play calls from the Voice of the Tigers Rod Bramblett and many bonus features.
title: All In: The Story of Auburn's Undefeated 2010 Season
